ContentTaxonomyTerm.name: ContentTaxonomyTerm
ContentTaxonomyTerm.description: Represents a term in a content taxonomy. Terms describe what content is or how it's used, and theyâ€™re organized in parent-child relationships in the taxonomy hierarchy.

Description.description: Description of the content taxonomy term. This description appears in the API and in the Content Taxonomy tab in the Digital Experiences App. The maximum length is 255 characters.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the content taxonomy term in the API. This field is unique within your organization. The name: must be 80 characters or fewer must begin with a letter can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters can't include spaces can't end with an underscore can't contain 2 consecutive underscores

ExternalId.description: The external ID of the content taxonomy term.

Name.description: Name of the content taxonomy term. The name must be between 2 and 255 characters long.
